backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods defined.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata describing a feature request to change the FinalWishScreen addressed name to 'Dear Urvi ji'.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files describing screen components and styling configuration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions for light/dark modes with romantic color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the React app into the root element.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app managing screen navigation, transitions, and progress indicators across four rose-themed pages.
frontend/src/components/RomanticLayout.t: Layout wrapper adding background image, gradient overlay, animated hearts, and centered content.
frontend/src/components/screens/BlueRose: Screen showing a blue rose image with 'Mystery' theme text in a styled card.
frontend/src/components/screens/FinalWis: Final screen displaying roseâ€‘day card, greeting 'Happy Rose Day, bachaðŸŒ¹', and addressed line 'Dear Urvi ji'.
frontend/src/components/screens/PinkRose: Screen presenting a pink rose image with 'Your Favorite' themed text.
frontend/src/components/screens/RedRoseS: Screen presenting a red rose image with 'Passion' themed text.
frontend/src/components/ScreenTransition: Wrapper component applying the screen-transition animation container.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and caching a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Authentication hook and provider managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and status handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind layers and extensive OKLCH CSS variables for light/dark themes, plus custom animations and decorative heart effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider, rendering the App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with plugins, theme extensions, OKLCH color tokens, custom fonts, animations, and container settings.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, feature requirements, and updates for a 4â€‘page romantic Rose Day website.
